resources.string:
"Welcome to Plant Pal! 
 Here's how to play: 
 1. Pick your plant. You can choose between a Tulip, Apple Tree, or Garlic. 
 2. Care for your plant. You can water it, spray fertilizer, spray pesticide, or hug your plant.
 3. Give it the perfect amount of love and care to get higher star plants, but be careful not to do too much, you might kill it!
 Have fun! "
